snippet: Peacekeepers fired warning shots to keep the gunmen out of the base, the United Nations said.
abstract: Gunfire into a United Nations compound in South Sudan wounds dozens and kills at least one civilian seeking refuge there.
lead_paragraph: Peacekeepers fired warning shots to keep the gunmen out of the base, the United Nations said.

headline.main: South Sudan: Gunfire at U.N. Base Kills One and Wounds Dozens
headline.print_headline: South Sudan: Gunfire at U.N. Base Kills One and Wounds Dozens
